title: 37 of 75 raw T206 still available - Collector condition
author: brianp-beme

posts.post_title: 37 of 75 raw T206 still available - Collector condition
posts.post_content:
Discounts for larger purchases:

$75 to $199   - 10%
$200 and above  - 15%

Shipping:

1 or 2 cards ordered :  $3.00 total
3 or more cards :  FREE 

A  group of 75 T206 collector condition cards are available, with most of the lower price cards that don't have a glaring flaw will have some creasing.  Any other flaws not obvious in scans will be noted. Shipping will be $3.00 for either 1 or 2 cards, and free for purchases of three cards or more. See above chart for discounts for larger purchases. A commitment to purchase locks in these cards.

Thanks,

Brian
